title: Segmentation fault on paste (Cmd+V) on latest master
body:
For bug reports, the following information can help speed up the process. Please
describe the bug that you have found and what you would expect to happen
instead.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open Alacritty on macOS
2. Paste anything 

### System

OS: macOS
Version: alacritty 0.11.0-dev (ff63344b)

### Logs

Crashes: STDERR, STDOUT
Font/Terminal size: `alacritty -vv`

```
[0.000002000s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Welcome to Alacritty
[0.000220083s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Version 0.11.0-dev (ff63344b)
[0.000961125s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Configuration files loaded from:
                                     "/Users/alisnic/.alacritty.yml"
[0.001332625s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Using environment locale: en_US.UTF-8
[0.001737250s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Loading "Monaco Nerd Font Mono" font
[0.021138583s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Estimated scaling factor: 2
[0.021175916s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Estimated window size: None
[0.021187250s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Estimated cell size: 19 x 40
[0.049214500s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Running on Apple M1
[0.049239250s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Using OpenGL 3.3 renderer
[0.051795791s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Display scale factor: 2
[0.051829916s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Filling glyph cache with common glyphs
[0.054031791s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Cell size: 19 x 40
[0.054049208s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Padding: 0 x 0
[0.054056750s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Width: 1600, Height: 1200
[0.054170708s] [INFO ] [alacritty] PTY dimensions: 30 x 84
[0.055687041s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Initialisation complete
[0.091434083s] [DEBUG] [alacritty_terminal] New num_cols is 151 and num_lines is 42
[0.092442250s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Padding: 0 x 0
[0.092461416s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Width: 2880, Height: 1694
[0.183483375s] [DEBUG] [alacritty_terminal] [unhandled osc_dispatch]: [['7'],['f''i''l''e'':''/''/''A''n''d''r''e''i''s''-''M''a''c''B''o''o''k''-''A''i''r''.''l''o''c''a''l''/''U''s''e''r''s''/''a''l''i''s''n''i''c'],] at line 959
zsh: segmentation fault  /Applications/AlacrittyNightly.app/Contents/MacOS/alacritty -vv
```

Keyboard and bindings: `alacritty --print-events` - 
[Alacritty-5015.log](https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty/files/8929923/Alacritty-5015.log)


Commit https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty/commit/4c171e767862e744ceed31def4036c79d7ebf1af seems the be culprit
